## hpr0598 :: Bash Scripting: Episode 2 Command Line Basics

 In the second installment Ken resolves to not do any work and so get's permission from Chess Griffin to reuse extracts from Linux Reality Episode 14 - Command Line Basics May 17, 2006
https://www.linuxreality.com/archives.php#14

Shownotes can be found at https://hackerpublicradio.org/shownotes/hpr0598.html
